title: Differentiate active/focus border color from inactive border
description: Currently both focus-ring and border use the same active-color and inactive-color. Consider whether having distinct colors for focused vs unfocused states would improve visual clarity.

title: Experiment with gradient support for focus-ring and border
description: Niri supports `active-gradient` and `inactive-gradient` for focus-ring and border elements. Explore using gradients instead of solid colors for a more dynamic look.
